Nightlight (Sedna):

Nightlight(Sedna) sat around and medited her situation, soon Kenzo 
or Rodimus would tell Maximal who was controling Nightlight's body 
and that isn't good. She had to lef the place and search the others 
Guardians...

She stood up and walked towards the exit.
